overview: For all submissive males that crave the comforting abuse of a strong bitch’s big, beautiful booty, fetish director Glenn King has a new female-superior treat in store: “Facesitting Tales #4.” Its cruel vignettes pit the capricious whims of heartless dommes against the pathetic lives of their male slaves. When a powerful woman wants to be sexually serviced, her victim knows he’s in for foot worship and smothering ass punishment... and he’d better say, “Yes, Mistress” the moment he comes up for air!
title: Facesitting Tales 4
